verses.roman:
śrī-śuka uvāca
bhagavat-puruṣai rājan
yāmyāḥ pratihatodyamāḥ
patiṁ vijñāpayām āsur
yamaṁ saṁyamanī-patim

synonyms: śrī-śukaḥ uvāca—Śukadeva Gosvāmī said; bhagavat-puruṣaiḥ—by the order carriers of the Lord, the Viṣṇudūtas; rājan—O King; yāmyāḥ—the order carriers of Yamarāja; pratihata-udyamāḥ—whose efforts were defeated; patim—their master; vijñāpayām āsuḥ—informed; yamam—Yamarāja; saṁyamanī-patim—the master of the city Saṁyamanī.
translation: Śrī Śukadeva Gosvāmī replied: My dear King, when the order carriers of Yamarāja were baffled and defeated by the order carriers of Viṣṇu, they approached their master, the controller of Saṁyamanī-purī and master of sinful persons, to tell him of this incident.
